title: Cryptocurrency and Legal Ethics
description: This blog throws light on how money has evolved from commodity to conventional currency, and now to cryptocurrency, increasing not only unique features but also risks for users.

description: This blog depicts how computer vision enables machines to understand and interpret visual data, leading to advancements in various fields like autonomous vehicles and biometrics.

author: Diyanshi Sharma
title: DevOps — The Next Big Thing
description: This blog demonstrates how DevOps is gaining momentum as a crucial software development approach, offering opportunities and transforming industries.Low-code development and serverless architecture are shaping the landscape.

author: Sachi Verma
title: A Dive into DevOps
description: This Blog teaches us about DevOps, which  is a key that combines software development with practices and tools of information technology, for efficient and high-quality software development.

description: This blog highlights technological prospects in May, including LFN Mentorship, Call for Code, Microsoft Build, IBM Quantum Spring Challenge, and OSOC.

author: Sachi Verma
title: Women in Technology (Timeline)
description: This blog educates us about the Inspirational contributions in tech by remarkable women like Ada Lovelace, Hedy Lamarr, Grace Hopper, Elizabeth Feinler, and Evelyn Berezin.
